title: Benihana franchise fee is $40,000
statement: The franchise fee payable to Benihana National Corp. for opening a new Benihana restaurant is $40,000.

citations.quote: Initial costs required to open a new BENIHANA restaurant include, without limitation, equipment and fixtures, inventory, insurance, working capital, liquor license costs, and other expenses, including a $40,000 franchise fee payable to BNC.
